Device Quick Reference

Device, Display, Dimensions, and Operating System
Images and assets should be oringally scaled @3x and then downscaled by 87% to fit 1920 x 1080px resolution.
  • Apple Watch 38mm
  • Retina Display
  • 340 × 272 pixels | @2x
  • Height: 38.6mm | Width: 33.3mm | Depth: 10.5mm
  • Apple Watch OS | Released: 2015
  • Apple Watch 42mm
  • Retina Display
  • 390 × 312 pixels | @2x
  • Height: 42.0mm | Width: 35.9mm | Depth: 10.5mm
  • Apple Watch OS | Released: 2015
  • iPhone 6 Plus
  • 5.5" Retina HD Display
  • 1920 × 1080 pixels | 401ppi | @3x
  • Height: 158.1 mm | Width: 77.8 mm | Depth: 7.1mm | Weight: 6.07oz
  • iOS 8 | Released: 2014-09
  • iPhone 6
  • 4.7" Retina HD Display
  • 1334 x 750 pixels | 326ppi | @2x
  • Height: 5.4 inches | Depth: 6.9mm
  • iOS 8 | Released: 2014-09
  • iPhone 5s, 5c, 5
  • 1136 x 640 pixels | 326ppi | @2x
  • 4” Retina Display | Height: 4.8 inches | Depth: 7.6mm
  • iOS 7 | Released: 2013-09
  • iPhone 4s
  • 960 x 640 pixels | 326ppi | @2x
  • 3.5” Retina Display | Height: 4.5 inches | Depth: 9.3mm
  • iOS 5 | Released: 2011-10
  • iPhone 3GS
  • Height: 4.5 inches | Depth: 12.3mm
  • 480 x 320 pixels | 163ppi | @1x
  • 3.5” Display
  • OS 3 | Released: 2009-06 | Supports: iOS 6.1.6
  • iPhone (1st Gen)
  • Height: 4.5 inches | Depth: 11.7mm
  • 480 x 320 pixels | 163ppi | @1x
  • 3.5" Display
  • OS 1.0 | Released: 2007-06
  • Supports: OS 3.1.3
